I feel like: I am really disappointed from this movie!Can't believe Star Wars is catering to feminists....The movie had a few cool moments but as a whole\,it's trying to make a point that females can also do everything cool but I think it's overdoing it\,way too much females being brave\,fearless...it just looks unnatural.I am never paying again to go to the cinema and see another Star Wars movie.I'll just wait a week or two after it officially launches and download it.You can thank Rian Johnson for that.
